.. X Controller Documentation documentation master file.

================================================================================
X1 Control Documentation
================================================================================

Welcome to the X1 documentation homepage!

This project is built for high performance brushless motor control. Source code is open source and can be found
`here. <https://github.com/prcrobo/xctrlPrecisionRobotics>`__ Note that X1 firmware is closed source and units ship pre-flahsed.

Table of Contents
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: General

   getting-started
